creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: daimyo's ship at center, adorned with pink and purple privacy curtain, a banner bearing his crests, and other flags and tassels; unadorned boat at LL filled with sleeping and a stretching attendant an their gear; other smaller boats are closer to shore; village, mountains, and trees in background

Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

title: Arai, from "53 Stations of the Tokaido Road"
